Header: 350 boats and 100 life jackets allocated for relief operations by the ministry of Fisheries
Content: Ministry of Fisheries has deployed 350 boats for the rescue operations conducted in areas affected by floods and landslides. Ministry of Fisheries in a statement said that the following boats have been deployed in Galle, Matara, Tangalle, kalutara and Gampaha areas. Moreover, more than 100 life jackets also have been given for the relevant areas.
